summary:
After Searching for a Male Overhaul Mod, with the Result of not fitting my taste, I started to make my own one.. :P
It's a work in progress Mod, much more Men in Skyrim that I've thought.
All in one and DLC only Versions.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][center][color=#c9daf8]You guys are crazy!!!! That's the very first time since I'm modding to reach that high! Thanks for all the Support, you are crazy! <3[/color][/center][/size][/font][img]https://i.imgur.com/ur9d0dt.jpg[/img]
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/55yi3wZ.gif[/img]

[center][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Big thanks to [/size][/color][/font][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#c9daf8][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/591616]sanosukex[/url]﻿ for the Port :)
SE Version [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92708][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18976][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92708]here[/url]﻿﻿[/color][/font][/size]
[/b][/center]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/wdJb9f9.png[/img]

[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Looking for a new, and fresh Overhaul Mod for your Men? Then you came to the right place!

This Mod will give the Men a new and fresh look, by trying to keep them look lore friendly. (does not count for all I guess xD)

It's an Male only Overhaul! So far It covers NPC's from Skyrim itself, Hearthfire and Dawnguard, still a very long road to go.

All reworked Guys who can follow you, level till 100 with you, [s]also they are Protected/Essential (some NPC's are default Save by Vanilla)[/s]  -Protection has been set back to Vanilla in Version 1.1

Groups like the Stormcloaks, Imperials and Dawnguards will have the same Warpaints on their faces, to show who they are Loyal to.

For now 3 different files: Full Version, all 3 DLC's needed!
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿  ﻿  Hearthfire only
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿  ﻿ Dawngaurd only
New - Vanilla Status esp (meaning: From me Protected/Essential NPC's are back to normal in this fact)

Used all kinds of Hair ,eye and Warpaint Mods, thanks to the Modders again! [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url] is the most used Mod here, special thanks to Expired!

[/size][/color][size=3][color=#c9daf8][b]Side Note: This Mod does not contain any Face- and Body Texture/Mesh. So you can use whatever Body and Face you like, which will give them a different look than you see in my Screenshots. ^^[/b][/color]
[/size][/font]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/QAwti7T.png[/img]

[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Myself I use S.A.M - Shape Atlas for Men from vectorplexus.com you see that Body in the Screenshots
also [/size][/color][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Fine Face Textures for Men - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815 seen in the Screenshots aswell
[/size][/color][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Northborn Scars for high Res Scars - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279[/size][/color][/font]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/kvnGMsN.png[/img]

[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#c9daf8][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79735]Salt and Wind - Rough Hair for KS Hairdos[/url] by Jasper
